thread.title: Wendy Bridges
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Wendy Bridges

author: Wendy Bridges
title: Wendy Bridges
text: I've found a winner. I love this site. I have order 6 wigs so far and have loved them all. The shipping time is perfect. Absolutely zero disappointments. I might to tell a few people about this. Is it wrong that I don't want to everyone, so that it remains my little secret for a while?
